info.title: Blume Digital Corp. - Inventory API
info.description: A JWT based user management system to authenticate and manage users, their roles, rights and other user related features for all applications developed and maintained by Blume Digital Corp.

get.summary: Retrieves all categories and subcategories under organization

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Organization Id or unique identifier which is the primary key of the organization

post.summary: Add new product catagory under organization

patch.summary: Update an existing product catagory under organization

delete.summary: Remove an existing category by category id

get.summary: Retrieves all common attributes of a particular type

parameters.name: attrType
parameters.description: Organization Id or unique identifier which is the primary key of the organization

delete.summary: Remove a common attribute by attribute id

get.summary: Retrieves paged list of products under organization
Retrieves list of products under organization for dropdown

patch.summary: Update an existing product subcategory under organization

delete.summary: Remove an existing product by product id

get.summary: Retrieves list of product variants under specific product

patch.summary: Synchronizes list of product variants under specific product

get.summary: Retrieves all categories and subcategories under category

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: Category Id or unique identifier which is the primary key of the organization

delete.summary: Remove an existing category/subcategory by category id

post.summary: Add new product subcategory under category

patch.summary: Update an existing product subcategory under category
